#BlackMagicCraft #Episode216 #Arcane

THANKS ARCHVILLAIN GAMES FOR SPONSORING THIS VIDEO!
CHECK THEM OUT: https://bit.ly/AVBMC

In this video I show you how I made 3x3 dungeon tiles for Dungeons & Dragons with arcane symbols that actually glow! I did this by making use of cheap LED string lights from Amazon.

GRAB SOME LED STRING LIGHTS:
(USA) https://amzn.to/3jMa9Or
(Canada) https://amzn.to/36O16c5
(UK) https://amzn.to/30P6AQg
(Germany) https://amzn.to/2IaMedD
